# OVERFLOW TEST
# FloatingPoint Integer  Over Under
# 1111110101111 11111111 1    0
# 0111110101111 01111111 1    0
# 0111100000000 00000000 0    0
#  
#  
# 1111010101111 11111111 1    0
# 0111010101111 01111111 1    0
# 0111000000000 00000000 0    0
#  
#  
# 1110110101111 11111111 1    0
# 0110110101111 01111111 1    0
# 0110100000000 00000000 0    0
#  
#  
# 1110010101111 11111111 1    0
# 0110010101111 01111111 1    0
# 0110000000000 00000000 0    0
#  
#  
# 1101110101111 11111111 1    0
# 0101110101111 01111111 1    0
# 0101100000000 00000000 0    0
#  
#  
# 1101010101111 11111111 1    0
# 0101010101111 01111111 1    0
# 0101000000000 00000000 0    0
#  
#  
# 1100110101111 11111111 1    0
# 0100110101111 01111111 1    0
# 0100100000000 00000000 0    0
#  
#  
# 1100010101111 11111111 1    0
# 0100010101111 01111111 1    0
# 0100000000000 00000000 0    0
#  
#  



# UNDERFLOW TEST
# FloatingPoint Integer  Over Under
# 1000010101111 10000000 0    1
# 0000010101111 00000000 0    1
# 0000000000000 00000000 0    0
#  
#  



# NORMAL TEST
# FloatingPoint Integer  Over Under
# 1011111111111 11111111 0    0
# 0011111111111 01111111 0    0
#  
# 1011011111111 10111111 0    0
# 0011011111111 00111111 0    0
#  
# 1010111111111 10011111 0    0
# 0010111111111 00011111 0    0
#  
# 1010011111111 10001111 0    0
# 0010011111111 00001111 0    0
#  
# 1001111111111 10000111 0    0
# 0001111111111 00000111 0    0
#  
# 1001011111111 10000011 0    0
# 0001011111111 00000011 0    0
#  
# 1000111111111 10000001 0    0
# 0000111111111 00000001 0    0
#  
# 1000011111111 10000000 0    1
# 0000011111111 00000000 0    1
